original_text: It is he that buildeth his stories in the heaven, and hath founded his troop in the earth; he that calleth for the waters of the sea, and poureth them out upon the face of the earth: The Lord is his name.
korean_text: 그의 궁전을 하늘에 세우시며 그 궁창의 기초를 땅에 두시며 바닷물을 불러 지면에 쏟으시는 이니 그 이름은 여호와시니라

sentences.original_text: It is he that buildeth his stories in the heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하늘에 그의 다락들을 세우시는 이시며

sentences.original_text: and hath founded his troop in the earth
he that calleth for the waters of the sea
and poureth them out upon the face of the earth
